description.en: Easily play back the music that is stored on your cloud service, directly in your browser or on your phone.
description.ro: Redă ușor muzica care este stocată in serviciul tău cloud, direct pe browser-ul/telefonul tău.
description.zh_CN: 直接在浏览器或手机上轻松播放存储在云服务中的音乐。
description.nl: Speel eenvoudig de muziek af die is opgeslagen op uw cloudservice, rechtstreeks in uw browser of op uw telefoon.
